name: Untitled - The Game
description:
An interactive story about a social outcast and how he goes out of his comfort zone to get a friend. 

Theme: Contrasting Elements.

Execution: For starters, the game is black and white, with the exception of the main characters, Jim, and Robin.  Another is the fact that he stands out from the crowd, and takes a leap of faith in order to break free from the prison he's put himself in with his social barrier.

Note from Developer: If you seem stuck, try pressing E! :)

Video contains spoilers!
